title: The new tactics of Britain’s far right
description: Far-right groups are mobilising in towns around the UK where asylum seekers are living in hotels. The protests are spreading – and turning increasingly aggressive. Help support our independent journalism at theguardian.com/infocus
episode: The new tactics of Britain’s far right
creator: The Guardian
